text: Nim'malli, ella bageya hannu hampalugaliruva hagu tala bhagadalli nadigalu hariyuttiruva, kharjura mattu draksigala ondu totaviruva yaradaru tanu vrd'dhanagi, tanna makkalu durbalaragiruvaga, a totada mele benki tumbida birugaliyu appalisi, a totavu suttu hoguvudannu istapaduvane? I riti, nivu cintane nadesabekendu allahanu tanna vacanagalannu nimage vivarisikoduttane
